alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 8:17PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Luna and southwestern Dona Ana Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 817 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles west of Afton to 6 miles south of Mesilla. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leasburg, Las Cruces, Radium Springs, NMSU Main Campus, Dona Ana, Mesilla, Fairacres, San Pablo, Picacho, Hill, Northeast Las Cruces, Corralitos, Fort Selden State Historic Site, Aden Crater, and Mesilla Valley Bosque State Park. Gusty winds, along with further storm development could impact the Southern New Mexico State Fair within the next 30 minutes or so. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 104 and 147. Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 17. Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 150 and 153. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
